name: CASA VERDE
description:
This game is based on the brazillian novella "O Alienista", published in 1882 and written by the great author of brazillian literature, Machado de Assis.

In this game, you are Dr. Simão Bacamarte, who decides to create Casa Verde, a type of Asylum for the mentally inhealthy, but the way he decides who are or are not healthy gets weirder and weirder.

PS1: PLAY IN FULL SCREEN PLS

PS2: I made this game in 72 hours all by myself, so I didn't have time to make much of a level design, narrative design or even a localization for portuguese. I hope I can fix this problems in the future.

PS2: Seeing as this is kinda of a alpha version, please submit your criticism in the comments so I can use for reference when working on it in the future.
